properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 4 at 6:22AM EST until January 4 at 9:28PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Middle Oconee River near Arcade affecting Barrow and Jackson
Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Middle Oconee River near Arcade.
* From this morning until this evening.
* At 545 AM Saturday the stage was 15.2 feet and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast to develop.
* Flood stage is 16 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage this morning, then
continue to rise, reaching near 16.7 feet by this afternoon. The
river will fall below flood stage by late this afternoon.
* At 16 feet, minor flooding begins in the woodlands, fields and
pastures upstream and downstream from the gage at Georgia Highway
82. A few dirt access roads will be flooded and a residential yard
just downstream from the gage site will begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
